lead_paragraph: A vulgar discussion recorded in 2005 on a soap opera set added to evidence that Mr. Trump has a record of sexist behavior.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael Barbaro, Nick Corasaniti, Patrick Healy, Thomas Kaplan and Alan Rappeport.
byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS, MAGGIE HABERMAN and JONATHAN MARTIN

headline.print_headline: Tape Reveals Trump Boast About Groping Women
headline.main: Donald Trump Apology Caps Day of Outrage Over Lewd Tape

snippet: A vulgar discussion recorded in 2005 on a soap opera set added to evidence that Mr. Trump has a record of sexist behavior....
